Installation¶

  1. On UNIX, install Perl5 by following these instructions. It uses Perlbrew.
  2. To switch to the new Perl installation, you might need to run
INSTALLER_PERL_VERSION=5.16.0
perlbrew switch perl-$INSTALLER_PERL_VERSION
  1. To install the dependencies you can now run (cpanm Module::Name)
cpanm YAML
  1. You need to make sure all depedencies are installed and loaded. The most obscure program is: qaTools. Start by downloading samtools v.0.1.18. qaTools needs this to build. Therefore you need to edit the Makefile in the qaTools directory to point to the samtools`directory before running ``make`.
